magic paths [mpath]: F3 R11
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc

summoned with #800 Summon Flame Spirit (Conjuration 6)

Flame Spirits are can sometimes be found roaming in hot deserts. They burn intensely and are always accompanied by a few Will o' the Wisps who thrive in the magic heat that surrounds the Flame Spirits. The Flame Spirits are skilled fire mages.
